entry.title: in case you missed it yesterday... 👇 D_D @vibesIRL party tomorrow alongside #EthCC in Paris 🇫🇷 @DuplexParis from 9pm - free entry & open bar ...
entry.summary: in case you missed it yesterday... 👇 D_D @vibesIRL party tomorrow alongside #EthCC in Paris 🇫🇷 @DuplexParis from 9pm - free entry & open bar come join us for the good folks, good vibes 😎 and developers dancing 💃 RSVP 👉 Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): D_D ~vibesIRL~ happening in Paris 🇫🇷🗼alongside #EthCC this Wednesday (20th) @DuplexParis💃 Register ➡️ good vibes and an open bar all night 😎 Thanks to our sponsors @ArcanaNetwork, @MetisDAO and @klaytn_official for this making the event possible🤝 https://lu.ma/developer-dao-vibes-irl-ethcc-paris-2022

entry.title: RT alephv.eth: FYI, hustle culture is out. What's cool is sleep maxing, you gotta be sleeping 18 hours a night doing 2 hours of work then having a nap...
entry.summary: RT alephv.eth FYI, hustle culture is out. What's cool is sleep maxing, you gotta be sleeping 18 hours a night doing 2 hours of work then having a nap. You gotta be unable to get out of bed for more than 3 hours, you gotta be prioritizing laying down over meetings. I do this and it's why I win.
